channel.title: Graphics Programming on Quentin King - Technical Artist
channel.description: Recent content in Graphics Programming on Quentin King - Technical Artist

item.title: DirectX NES Emulator
item.description: A C++ emulator using DirectX 11 as a frontend so I could play around with some CRT effects.

item.title: Raytraced Image-Based Collision Detection
item.description: Fourth year capstone project at U of T. A novel approach to computing collision detection and response between rigid bodies by doing image based collision detection at the same time as a scene is rendered through raytracing.

item.title: DCC Art Scripts
item.description: Collection of small scripts written for various art software, mostly python. The content in this varies from stable tools to quick scripts I whipped up in 10 minutes in order to save time. I mainly just put these online in case it helps anyone else.
